snippet.title: The Star Named EOS (Silver Lining Studio) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Capture photos and step back in time to experience the moments held within them in The Star Named EOS. Solve a variety of puzzles to help a young photographer uncover the truth about his mother’s disappearance and rediscover the beauty that is to be found in the world.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619230/The_Star_Named_EOS/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------

https://youtube.com/sixoneindie

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
